LongDescription:
Bring back the sleep menu alert from tvOS 12 to tvOS 13+ (This disables the control center). 
 This tweak is open sourced on GitHub! (https://github.com/iKilledAppl3/BringBackSleep/) 
 Follow me on Twitter @iKilledAppl3 and Donate via PayPal (https://paypal.me/iKilledAppl3) or Patreon! (https://www.patreon.com/iKilledAppl3) 
 Configure options in the settings application.
